info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 25 at 11:47AM MDT until October 26 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations between 2 and 5 inches. * WHERE...Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft, Gallatin Valley, Madison River Valley, and Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday evening and Thursday morning commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A break in the snow is expected later this afternoon before another wave of snow overspreads the area tonight through the day on Thursday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.
